artist: Jack Larsen; Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: 3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Black warp.  Leather strips of white, grey, beiges and black nylon/cotton for weft. Mount labeled H-3 (grey, white, beiges, black)
